# totalCPUTime

**Instance Property**

The total CPU time used during the exception.

## Declaration

```swift
var totalCPUTime: Measurement<UnitDuration> { get }
```

## Viewing app CPU time

- **totalSampledTime**: The total time the app was sampled during the exception.
